title: John Leguizamo to Be Honored at Sing Out for Freedom Event in New York
summary: The event, set for NYU Skirball on Oct. 27, is a joint effort of the New York Civil Liberties Union and American Civil Liberties Union established to “shine a light on social injustices and civil rights issues.”

title: Some premium travel rewards credit cards now cost over $500 per year. What to know before you apply
summary: American Express was the latest credit card company to increase the annual fee for a premium rewards card. Here’s what to consider before signing up.
